titles.title: A resolution to authorize the release of documents by the Committee on Foreign Relations.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/20/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Chairman and Ranking Minority Member of the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations, acting jointly, to provide to the U.S. Attorney for the District of Colorado a transcript of certain deposition testimony, subject to the U.S. Attorney's agreement to abide by confidentiality and other requirements of the Committee.
